author: paras25619@gmail.com
name: readme-generator-agent
description: README Generator Agent is an AI-powered documentation assistant that automatically creates clear, structured, and professional README files for software projects. It analyzes the codebase and project context to generate sections like overview, installation, usage, features, and contribution guidelines—helping teams improve project clarity, onboarding, and maintainability.

environment_variables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM calls
OpenRouter API key for LLM calls
GitHub personal access token for repository access
Mem0 API key for memory operations
